summary:
Caterpillar Inc., or Cat, is a famous American company that makes big machines for building, mining, and engineering. It's the biggest construction equipment maker in the world! In 2018, it was ranked a top company in the USA and globally.

The company started in 1925 when two tractor companies merged. It changed its name to Caterpillar Inc. in 1986. Its headquarters moved from Peoria to Deerfield, Illinois, in 2017, and then to Irving, Texas, in 2022.

Caterpillar also sells clothes, boots, and tough phones with its brand name. You can spot their machines by their bright yellow color and "CAT" logo.
title: Caterpillar Inc.
